articles.title: How Protein Differences Across Species Drive Biological Diversity - Technology Networks
articles.description: Yale researchers have compared the proteomes of skin cells from 11 mammals, which, they say, will help scientists understand the molecular drivers of biodiversity and how these factors have evolved over time.
